name: Hit Different: Game
description:
(NOTE: I don't own the rights to the music, images, and video content used. Please support SZA by listening to Hit Different on all streaming services and watching the video on YouTube.)

This is an art game dedicated to the SZA's single "Hit Different."

When blood appears on a mirror, hit the right key to block it out.

Keys for each Mirror:

A, Z, S  (Get it? Ok I'm done lol)
